title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a creamy tomato-based gravy.

title: Veggie Stir Fry
summary: Crisp vegetables tossed in a savory soy-ginger sauce, served over rice.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Seasoned beef in warm tortillas with salsa, lettuce, and cheese.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Toasted sourdough topped with smashed avocado, chili flakes, and lemon.

title: Blueberry Pancakes
summary: Fluffy pancakes filled with blueberries and a drizzle of maple syrup.
